topics.Unspecified: All Except Governance, and SNS & Neurons' Fund

topics_description.NeuronManagement: A special topic by means of which a neuron can be managed by the followees for this topic (in this case, there is no fallback to default). Votes on this topic are not included in the voting history of the neuron. For proposals on this topic, only the neuron’s followees on the topic that the proposals pertain to are allowed to vote. Because the set of eligible voters of proposals on this topic is restricted, proposals on this topic have a shorter than normal voting period.
topics_description.ExchangeRate: All proposals provide information in “real time” about the market value of ICP, as measured by an International Monetary Fund (IMF) Special Drawing Right (SDR) , which allows the NNS to convert ICP to cycles (which power computation) at a rate that keeps their real-world cost constant. Because proposals on this topic are very frequent, they have a shorter voting period, and votes on this topic are not included in the voting history of the neuron.
topics_description.NetworkEconomics: Proposals that administer network economics — for example, determining what rewards should be paid to node providers.
topics_description.Governance: All proposals that administer governance — for example, motions and the configuration of certain parameters.
topics_description.NodeAdmin: All proposals that administer node machines somehow, including but not limited to upgrading or configuring the OS, upgrading or configuring the virtual machine framework, and upgrading or configuring the node replica software.
topics_description.ParticipantManagement: All proposals that administer network participants — for example, granting and revoking DCIDs (data center identities) or NOIDs (node operator identities).
topics_description.SubnetManagement: All proposals that administer network subnets — for example, creating new subnets, adding and removing subnet nodes, and splitting subnets.
topics_description.NetworkCanisterManagement: All proposals to manage NNS-controlled canisters not covered by other topics (Protocol Canister Management or Service Nervous System Management).
topics_description.Kyc: Proposals that update KYC information for regulatory purposes — for example, during the initial Genesis distribution of ICP in the form of neurons.
topics_description.NodeProviderRewards: Topic for proposals to reward node providers.
topics_description.IcOsVersionElection: Proposals handling election of IC OS versions.
topics_description.IcOsVersionDeployment: Proposals handling deployments of IC OS versions.
topics_description.SnsAndCommunityFund: Proposals relating to service nervous systems (SNS) and Neurons' Fund.
topics_description.ApiBoundaryNodeManagement: Proposals related to the management of API boundary nodes.
topics_description.SubnetRental: Proposals related to renting a subnet — for example a subnet rental request.
topics_description.ProtocolCanisterManagement: All proposals to manage protocol canisters, which are considered part of the ICP protocol and are essential for its proper functioning.
topics_description.ServiceNervousSystemManagement: All proposals to manage the canisters of service nervous systems (SNS), including upgrading relevant canisters and managing SNS framework canister WASMs through SNS-W.

rewards_description.AcceptVotes: The proposal is still accepting votes, for the purpose of voting rewards.
rewards_description.ReadyToSettle: The proposal is no longer accepting votes. It is due to settle in the next reward event.
rewards_description.Settled: The proposal has been taken into account in a reward event.
rewards_description.Ineligible: The proposal is not eligible to be taken into account in a reward event.

status_description.Open: A decision has not yet been made to adopt or reject the proposal.
status_description.Accepted: The proposal has been adopted. Either execution has not yet started, or it has started but the outcome is not yet known.
status_description.Executed: The proposal was adopted and successfully executed.
status_description.Failed: The proposal was adopted, but execution failed.
